titleStmt.title: Jokes Harran
SHAWI Corpus

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.

spanGrp.span: The ʕUbāde gathered another time (and said), “What should we plant, what should we plant?” They said, “What should we plant on the soil, what should we plant over there?” Someone said, “O sheikh, let’s plant salt!”

It is said that they had brought salt and planted it on the soil. They were waiting until salt may come out. They were waiting until salt may come out, but the salt did not come out. They had planted salt, and how should the salt come out from the soil? It would not!
One day someone was sitting at the field watching it. It is said that he looked around and saw flies coming.

The flies came and he returned running to the sheikh (saying), “Sheikh, sheikh!” The sheikh said, “What’s the matter?” He said “Sheikh, I think that the thing we have planted, the salt that we have planted, has been eaten by flies. That is why it is not coming out.”
He said, “Grab your guns and go! This time stay at the salt, at the field! And when the flies come shoot them!”
It is said that two friends were sitting there and talking about They were watching the field. Then a fly came tzzzz.
It settled on the forehead of one of the friends. He said “Hold! Don’t move!” – “Dude,” He said, “What is up with you?” He said, “Do not move!” He aimed the gun on him and shot him.

After he had hit him, he put him down on the ground and said, “Get up! Man, get up! I have killed one. Look how its blood is! Look, its blood has splashed on it.” He looked and saw that his friend was also dead. He said, “One of us, one of them. That’s what happens. One of us, one of them.”
